languages.text: "Исполняю немедленно, Лорд-капитан". {n}Дворец Правосудия замирает на несколько минут, пока голос Вигдис не возвращается в эфир.{/n}
"At once, Lord Captain." {n}The Palace of Justice falls silent for several minutes, until Vigdis's voice returns.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Исполняю немедленно, Лорд-капитан". {n}Дворец Правосудия замирает на несколько минут, пока голос Вигдис не возвращается в эфир.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "At once, Lord Captain." {n}The Palace of Justice falls silent for several minutes, until Vigdis's voice is back on air.{/n}
"At once, Lord Captain." {n}The Palace of Justice falls silent for several minutes, until Vigdis's voice is back on air.{/n}
"At once, Lord Captain." {n}The Palace of Justice falls silent for several minutes, until Vigdis's voice returns.{/n}

{n}The Prefect's eyebrow crawls upward pointedly behind her spectacles.{/n} "I had presumed the Astropathic Choir needed no introduction. They count as among the Imperium's most valuable servants, without whom all communication between your worlds would collapse. In addition to that, each of them is a sanctioned psyker."
"At once, Lord Captain." {n}The Palace of Justice falls silent for several minutes, until Vigdis's voice returns.{/n}
"At once, Lord Captain." {n}The Palace of Justice falls silent for several minutes, until Vigdis's voice returns.{/n}
"At once, Lord Captain." {n}The Palace of Justice falls silent for several minutes, until Vigdis's voice returns.{/n}

languages.text: "Sofort, Lord Captain." {n}Im Justizpalast herrscht einige Minuten lang Stille, ehe erneut Vigdis' Stimme ertönt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "At once, Lord Captain." {n}The Palace of Justice falls silent for several minutes, until Vigdis's voice returns.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sofort, Lord Captain." {n}Im Justizpalast herrscht einige Minuten lang Stille, ehe erneut Vigdis' Stimme ertönt.{/n}

languages.text: « Tout de suite, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Le silence s'installe dans le palais de justice pendant plusieurs minutes, jusqu'à ce que la voix de Vigdis se fasse à nouveau entendre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "At once, Lord Captain." {n}The Palace of Justice falls silent for several minutes, until Vigdis's voice returns.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Tout de suite, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Le silence s'installe dans le palais de justice pendant plusieurs minutes, jusqu'à ce que la voix de Vigdis se fasse à nouveau entendre.{/n}

languages.text: “立刻照办，舰长大人。”{n}整个正义大殿笼罩在沉默之中。几分钟后，维格迪斯的声音再次响了起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "At once, Lord Captain." {n}The Palace of Justice falls silent for several minutes, until Vigdis's voice returns.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “立刻照办，舰长大人。”{n}整个正义大殿笼罩在沉默之中。几分钟后，维格迪斯的声音再次响了起来。{/n}

languages.text: «De inmediato, Lord Capitán». {n}El Palacio de la Justicia calla durante unos minutos hasta que la voz de Vigdis vuelve a oírse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "At once, Lord Captain." {n}The Palace of Justice falls silent for several minutes, until Vigdis's voice returns.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «De inmediato, Lord Capitán». {n}El Palacio de la Justicia calla durante unos minutos hasta que la voz de Vigdis vuelve a oírse.{/n}

languages.text: 「直ちに、ロード・キャプテン」{n}ヴィグディスの声が戻るまで、司法宮は数分間静寂に包まれる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "At once, Lord Captain." {n}The Palace of Justice falls silent for several minutes, until Vigdis's voice returns.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「直ちに、ロード・キャプテン」{n}ヴィグディスの声が戻るまで、司法宮は数分間静寂に包まれる。{/n}

languages.text: "Emriniz olur Lord Kaptan." {n}Adalet Sarayı, birkaç dakikalığına sessizliğe gömülüyor. Nihayetinde bu sessizlik, Vigdis'in sesiyle bozuluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "At once, Lord Captain." {n}The Palace of Justice falls silent for several minutes, until Vigdis's voice returns.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Emriniz olur Lord Kaptan." {n}Adalet Sarayı, birkaç dakikalığına sessizliğe gömülüyor. Nihayetinde bu sessizlik, Vigdis'in sesiyle bozuluyor.{/n}
